name: Message Alerts For WooCommerce
author: The Tech Pad

sections.description:
Send WhatsApp order(WooCommerce) alerts to your Custoemrs.

This plugin allows to send WooCommerce product order alert messages to Customers and store owner via WhatsApp.

It works seamlessly and fully automated. Whenever customer made new purchase, he/she will get whatsapp message with order details.

Also a copy of message to the store owner alerting about the new order.
sections.installation:
It is very easy to use this pluign. in few minutes.

  1. Download the plugin .zip file
  2. Log in to yourdomain.com/wp-admin
  3. Click Plugins -> Add New -> Upload
  4. Activate the plugin
  5. Go to https://app.thetechpad.com/register and register yourself, Choose any plan, all plans are 7 days free to use
  6. Add your device and get api from https://app.thetechpad.com/apikeys and paste in settings
sections.faq:
Is it works only with WhatsApp business?

It works for both WhatsApp business and personal.

Can I use mutiple store admin WhatsApp numbers

Yes. Use comma sepeated numbers to receive alerts on Whatsapp about new orders and order updates.

Where Do I get API key?

Go to https://app.thetechpad.com/register and register yourself, Choose any plan, all plans are 7 days free to use.

Does it needs Facebook verified WhatsApp number?

No. It works for all WhatsApp Numbers.

Go to https://app.thetechpad.com/register and register yourself, Choose any plan, all plans are 7 days free to use.
